import React from 'react' import mylogo from '../images/mylogo.jpg' export const About = () => { return (

About Me

A odoo developer engineer with hands- on experience in all levels of testing, including performance, functional, integration, system, and user acceptance.

Tunisia

Tunis, Tunisia

jarraymassaoud1@gmail.com

+216 97 73 54 81

) } export default About
